text: Dmitry Svetushkin (; ; 25 July 1980 â€“ 4 September 2020) was a Moldovan chess player. He was awarded the title Grandmaster by FIDE in 2002. He won the Moldovan Chess Championship in 2000. He tied for first with Johan Hellsten and Marcin Szymanski in the Ikaros Chess Festival 2003. Svetushkin died on 4 September 2020, aged 40. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Moldovan people
title: Dmitry Svetushkin
